mapper.insert: insert into cart(created_who,product_id, size, count) values (#{cart.created_who}, #{cart.product_id}, #{cart.size}, #{cart.count})
mapper.select: select * from cart where created_who=#{cart.created_who} AND product_id=#{cart.product_id} AND size=#{cart.size}
mapper.update: update cart SET count = count + #{update.count} WHERE created_who=#{update.created_who} AND product_id=#{update.product_id} AND size=#{update.size}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where created_who=#{remove.created_who} AND product_id=#{remove.product_id} AND size=#{remove.size}
mapper.select: select c.product_id as id, p.pd_name as name, upper(c.size) as size, p.pd_price as price, c.count, (c.count * p.pd_price) as total_price from cart as c inner join product as p on c.product_id = p.product_id where c.created_who=#{createdWho}
